sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"特别地"之意。
means: specially ： 着重为做某事而"专门地、特意地"，相当于on purpose。
especially ： 较多地用于正式文体，侧重超过其它全部，突出到"特别地"的程度，相当于in particular。
particularly ： 用来指同类中特别突出的一个。

sentence.Network_en: Be particularly fastidious about washing your hands before touching food.
sentence.Network_cn: 接触食物前尤其对洗手不能有半点马虎。

sentence.Network_en: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

sentence.Network_en: He was not a particularly good shot because of his eyesight.
sentence.Network_cn: 他视力不好，算不上是一个出色的射手。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 287 cake n. 蛋糕 288 particularly ad. 特别,尤其 289 collector n. 收集家,收税员搜集者.
尤字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 过失,罪过〖 mistake〗 尤其,更加〖 particularly〗 尤 yóu.
新编大学英语单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... panic n. 恐慌， 慌乱 particularly ad. 特别地， 尤其 payment n. 偿付的钱.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... particular a. 特定的，特别的 particularly ad. 特别，格外，尤其 partition 分区.

list.abs: 说明方法有哪些... ... It so happened that I expected 既来之则安之。 Not particularly 不见得。 Quite a competitor 强劲的对手.
That is not something I particularly aspire to at this moment ., 目前 , 这不是我特别向往的.
I particularly remember his interest in my children ., 我尤其记得他对我孩子的兴趣.
particularity 特殊性特性particularly urgent 特别紧急particularly 特别地
specific kinds of military force have proven particularly useful in the actual interventions ?, 在实际的干预中 , 哪些类型的军事力量已经证明是特别有用的?

entry.def: You use particularly to indicate that what you are saying applies especially to one thing or situation.

example.ex: Keep your office space looking good, particularly your desk...
example.tran: 保持办公环境的整洁，尤其是你的桌子。

example.ex: More local employment will be created, particularly in service industries...
example.tran: 当地会创造出更多的就业机会，尤其是服务行业。

entry.def: Particularly means more than usual or  more than other things.

example.tran: 进展情况格外令人失望。

example.ex: I particularly liked the wooden chests and chairs.
example.tran: 我格外喜欢木箱子和木椅子。

means.word_mean: 1. to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common;

sentences.sentence: "an especially (or specially) cautious approach to the danger"

means.word_mean: 2. specifically or especially distinguished from others;

sentences.sentence: "trace major population movements for the Pueblo groups in particular"
"everyone has a moment in history which belongs particularly to him"- John Knowles

auth_sentence.content: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This technique is particularly useful in treating bladder cancer.

auth_sentence.content: She has been particularly honoured in her home city.
auth_sentence.res_content: She has been particularly honoured in her home city.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She has been particularly honoured in her home city.

auth_sentence.content: Particularly misleading is the "Organic" Substance Model.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Particularly misleading is the "Organic" Substance Model.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a=ad+part部分,分开→向另一部分→分别地, 分离的
de分开+part部分,分开→部分分开→离开
im无+partial有偏见的→无偏见的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可给予的, [律][土地,产业等]不能分割的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+part部分,分开+ible能……的→不能分成部分

stems_affixes.value_cn: 部分的,不完全的;偏袒的,不公平的,偏爱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: part部分,分开+ial……的→adj.部分的,不完全的;偏袒的,不公平的,偏爱的
part部分,分开+icular有……的→有自己部分的→特别的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分离, 分成零件, 分别地, 分离着
stems_affixes.word_buile: a=ad+part部分,分开→向另一部分→分别地, 分离的
particular特殊的+ly表副词→adv.独特地, 显著地
part部分,分开+ly表副词→adv.部分, 几分
a+part部分,分开+ment具体物→楼房分出的一部分→公寓
counter相反+part部分→反面一样的部分→对应人物
de向下+part部分,分开+ment表名词→下面的部分→部门,系
part部分,分开→n.部分, 局部 v.分开

stems_affixes.value_cn: 粒子,微粒;极小量;小品词,虚词
stems_affixes.word_buile: part部分,分开+icle小东西→小部分→少量
part部分,分开+icular有……的→有自己部分的→特别的
parti=party党,一部分人+san人→党人→党徒
part部分,分开+ition表名词→[分成]部分

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合作者,合伙人,合股人,伙伴,舞伴,配偶
stems_affixes.word_buile: part部分,分开+n+er人→n.合作者,合伙人,合股人,伙伴,舞伴,配偶

stems_affixes.value_cn: 党, 政党, 随行人员
stems_affixes.word_buile: part部分,分开+y人→n.党, 政党, 随行人员
de分开+part部分,分开→部分分开→离开
im进入+part部分,分开→进入知识的一部分→传授
part部分,分开→n.部分, 局部 v.分开
part部分,分开+take拿→拿一部分→partake分享,参与

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参与,参加;分享,分担;含有,带有
stems_affixes.word_buile: parti=part部分+cip抓+ate表动词→抓住成为一部分→参与

Sentence.sentence: Here's where things get interesting, though: If a particularly important passage is highlighted by multiple Inkling users, that information is stored on the cloud and is available for anyone reading the same textbook to come across.
So why not limit the density of food outlets, particularly ones that sell food rich in empty calories
We select our food very particularly.
What makes monarch butterflies particularly interesting is they migrate, all the way to California or Mexico in back.

As a young man, he began walking over tens of thousands of miles during his lifetime, through the south to Florida, the west to California and north to Alaska, where readers are taken a long and particularly hair-raising adventure on a large mass of floating ice
This is particularly crucial in the case of meat production, where beef uses about 50 times more water than vegetables.

jushi.english: He made a long and thorough examination, particularly of the eyes.
jushi.chinese: 他作了一次长久而彻底的检查,特别是眼睛。
